Tyrone Wrice, ónyé a maara nke ọma site na aha egwu ya bụ Hurt-M-Badd, bụ onye America na-agụ egwu na ónyé na-emepụta ihe ndekọ
Ọ bụbu onye otu R&B duo B-Rezell na Marc "MGM" McWilliams, nke pụtara na Death Row Records 1994 compilations Murder Was the Case na Above the Rim ♡ The Soundtrack tupu nkewa ahụ
O sonyere na 2Pac's 1996 The Don Killuminati: The 7 Day Theory album, nke kachasị mepụta otu "Hail Mary"
N'afọ 1997, o jikọrọ aka mepụta otu egwu ọ bụla maka abọm izizi nke The Lady of Rage na Gang Related The Soundtrack

Site na 1998 ruo 2002, ọ gara n'ihu na-emepụta egwu màkà Outlawz na 2Pac's post-mortumous releases, yana iso Willie D na Snypaz rụọ ọrụ. N'afọ 2013 o mepụtara egwu mmeri màkà Fatal's The Interview: Ọ bụghị Gimmik 2 Me.
